colour_text.last_approved_text: Some Marauders walk openly within the lands of other races, not seen as a threat but a northern foreigner - a barbarian. But they are wrong, he is a threat.

colour_text.last_approved_text: There are many monsters in the northern wastes - creatures that will eat a man no matter which god he worships. A tribe's Beast Tamer can bring such monsters to heel… if he has the talent.

colour_text.last_approved_text: Some nobles of the mortal nations - the rich ones - take to buying antiquities and cursed items. Their ignorance in unearthing such relics is our ally.

colour_text.last_approved_text: The servants of Chaos are more than the barbarous Northmen - throughout the mortal realms secret cults worship the true Gods, and so our plans advance.

ancillaries.colour_text: The servants of Chaos are more than the barbarous Northmen - throughout the mortal realms secret cults worship the true Gods, and so our plans advance.

colour_text.last_approved_text: Said to have come from the ruins of Mordheim, Darksouls do not age and await the return of the Daemons that once possessed them.

ancillaries.colour_text: Some Nightmares are the long-dead carcasses of dead warhorses, brought back to life through necromantic magic.

colour_text.last_approved_text: The steeds of the Midnight Aristocracy are unnatural destriers called Nightmares. They are Undead stallions clad in baroque barding.

ancillaries.colour_text: The steeds of the Midnight Aristocracy are unnatural destriers called Nightmares. They are Undead stallions clad in baroque barding.

colour_text.last_approved_text: Hellsteeds are the unholy fusion of horse and giant bat, bound by Dark Magic - a fitting steed for a Vampire noble.

ancillaries.colour_text: Hellsteeds are the unholy fusion of horse and giant bat, bound by Dark Magic - a fitting steed for a Vampire noble.

colour_text.last_approved_text: The steeds of the Midnight Aristocracy are unnatural destriers called Nightmares. They are Undead stallions clad in baroque barding.

ancillaries.colour_text: The steeds of the Midnight Aristocracy are unnatural destriers called Nightmares. They are Undead stallions clad in baroque barding.

colour_text.last_approved_text: Hellsteeds are the unholy fusion of horse and giant bat, bound by Dark Magic - a fitting steed for a Vampire noble.

ancillaries.colour_text: Hellsteeds are the unholy fusion of horse and giant bat, bound by Dark Magic - a fitting steed for a Vampire noble.

colour_text.last_approved_text: Animated by Dark Magic, a zombie dragon is an unholy parody of a once-noble beast now borne aloft by great tattered wings, its body covered with thick, withered hide.

ancillaries.colour_text: Animated by Dark Magic, a zombie dragon is an unholy parody of a once-noble beast now borne aloft by great tattered wings, its body covered with thick, withered hide.

colour_text.last_approved_text: A Wight King was once a Chieftain or a Warrior King of his tribe and so may have been buried with a loyal steed that still wears its rusted barding.

ancillaries.colour_text: A Wight King was once a Chieftain or a Warrior King of his tribe and so may have been buried with a loyal steed that still wears its rusted barding.

colour_text.last_approved_text: The Wight King calls forth a spectral steed of bone to ride upon, should he have favoured it during his once-lived life.

ancillaries.colour_text: The Wight King calls forth a spectral steed of bone to ride upon, should he have favoured it during his once-lived life.

colour_text.last_approved_text: During the Golden Age, a Rune of Battle would be seen on Dwarf Banners from many Holds, for the Clans were always thirsty for war.

ancillaries.colour_text: During the Golden Age, a Rune of Battle would be seen on Dwarf Banners from many Holds, for the Clans were always thirsty for war.

colour_text.last_approved_text: This rune magnifies the natural anti-magic aura already residing inside each and every Dwarf.

ancillaries.colour_text: This rune magnifies the natural anti-magic aura already residing inside each and every Dwarf.

colour_text.last_approved_text: This ancient rune of protection was first fashioned by the Ancestor Goddess Valaya herself.

ancillaries.colour_text: This ancient rune of protection was first fashioned by the Ancestor Goddess Valaya herself.

colour_text.last_approved_text: Bright and angry glow the Runes of Fury, the weapons that hold them almost jumping out of their wielders' hands in desperation to strike the foe.

ancillaries.colour_text: Bright and angry glow the Runes of Fury, the weapons that hold them almost jumping out of their wielders' hands in desperation to strike the foe.

colour_text.last_approved_text: A Dwarf wielding a weapon bearing the Runes of Might can fell a Giant in a flurry of axe blows.

ancillaries.colour_text: A Dwarf wielding a weapon bearing the Runes of Might can fell a Giant in a flurry of axe blows.

colour_text.last_approved_text: A weapon with this rune moves to block incoming attacks, making its wielder extremely hard to hit.

ancillaries.colour_text: A weapon with this rune moves to block incoming attacks, making its wielder extremely hard to hit.

colour_text.last_approved_text: The Rune of Striking causes the weapon to hit the foe’s most vulnerable area with an uncanny precision.

ancillaries.colour_text: The Rune of Striking causes the weapon to hit the foe’s most vulnerable area with an uncanny precision.

colour_text.last_approved_text: Troops that bear this rune are not restricted by the bounds of their army's deployment zone.

ancillaries.colour_text: Troops that bear this rune are not restricted by the bounds of their army's deployment zone.

colour_text.last_approved_text: This ancient Elven heirloom glows with protective energies that become increasingly more powerful in the presence of evil sorcery.

ancillaries.colour_text: This ancient Elven heirloom glows with protective energies that become increasingly more powerful in the presence of evil sorcery.

colour_text.last_approved_text: A precious stone that glows at the break of every dawn, its bearer is said to be protected by an invisible field.

ancillaries.colour_text: A precious stone that glows at the break of every dawn, its bearer is said to be protected by an invisible field.

colour_text.last_approved_text: This cloak is made from the skin of the fierce dragon Fyrskar - now an heirloom of Karak Kadrin and a symbol of vows already fulfilled.

ancillaries.colour_text: This cloak is made from the skin of the fierce dragon Fyrskar - now an heirloom of Karak Kadrin and a symbol of vows already fulfilled.

colour_text.last_approved_text: The Dragonbane Gem was found in the gullet of the legendary drake, Helorgondrax. The beast had choked on the stone in mid-flight and crashed into a Halfling feasting hall at supper time.

ancillaries.colour_text: The Dragonbane Gem was found in the gullet of the legendary drake, Helorgondrax. The beast had choked on the stone in mid-flight and crashed into a Halfling feasting hall at supper time.

colour_text.last_approved_text: Those that carry the Luckstone are said to cheat fate, for a time at any rate.

ancillaries.colour_text: Those that carry the Luckstone are said to cheat fate, for a time at any rate.

colour_text.last_approved_text: This jet-black amulet is said to contain a bound djinn, who will deflect enemy magic.

ancillaries.colour_text: This jet-black amulet is said to contain a bound djinn, who will deflect enemy magic.

colour_text.last_approved_text: The lodestone of pure obsidian contains many dark djinn, imprisoned by a sultan-sorcerer whose name is lost to time. It is a powerful anti-magic artefact.

ancillaries.colour_text: The lodestone of pure obsidian contains many dark djinn, imprisoned by a sultan-sorcerer whose name is lost to time. It is a powerful anti-magic artefact.

colour_text.last_approved_text: The barest essence of a djinn, captured within black obsidian, is enough to weaken enemy spells.

ancillaries.colour_text: The barest essence of a djinn, captured within black obsidian, is enough to weaken enemy spells.

colour_text.last_approved_text: Those that wear the Talisman of Endurance can tolerate wounds and pain and suffering far in excess of mortal norms.

ancillaries.colour_text: Those that wear the Talisman of Endurance can tolerate wounds and pain and suffering far in excess of mortal norms.

colour_text.last_approved_text: The gleaming Talisman of Preservation gives its wearer the ability to shrug off mortal wounds.

ancillaries.colour_text: The gleaming Talisman of Preservation gives its wearer the ability to shrug off mortal wounds.

colour_text.last_approved_text: This is a silver talismanic device worn on a chain that is said to deflect killing blows or sure-striking arrows on occasion.

ancillaries.colour_text: This is a silver talismanic device worn on a chain that is said to deflect killing blows or sure-striking arrows on occasion.

colour_text.last_approved_text: The Dragon Crown has been worn by the High King since the founding of Karaz-a-Karak.

ancillaries.colour_text: The Dragon Crown has been worn by the High King since the founding of Karaz-a-Karak.

colour_text.last_approved_text: Named after the Tzeentchian Sorcerer who discovered it, the Eye sees nearly all. Its current owner should make use of its prophetic powers...

ancillaries.colour_text: Named after the Tzeentchian Sorcerer who discovered it, the Eye sees nearly all. Its current owner should make use of its prophetic powers...

colour_text.last_approved_text: Created by the warrior mage, Fredrik von Tarnus, the Silver Seal wards away harmful blows and fell sorceries.

ancillaries.colour_text: Created by the warrior mage, Fredrik von Tarnus, the Silver Seal wards away harmful blows and fell sorceries.

colour_text.last_approved_text: A massive axe bathed in the spiteful magicks of the Night Goblins, it is a weapon to bring home all their curses upon the stunties.

ancillaries.colour_text: A massive axe bathed in the spiteful magicks of the Night Goblins, it is a weapon to bring home all their curses upon the stunties.

colour_text.last_approved_text: The infamous event known as Ragnarork will see the world destroyed in an orgy of fire and slaughter at the hands of the Greenskins. This is rumoured to be the axe that will kick it all off. Best swing it with caution… or not!

ancillaries.colour_text: The infamous event known as Ragnarork will see the world destroyed in an orgy of fire and slaughter at the hands of the Greenskins. This is rumoured to be the axe that will kick it all off. Best swing it with caution… or not!

colour_text.last_approved_text: This blade constantly drips with blood as if only just pulled from a corpse - those that wield it scream with rage, demanding to feed the sword its next victim.

ancillaries.colour_text: This blade constantly drips with blood as if only just pulled from a corpse - those that wield it scream with rage, demanding to feed the sword its next victim.

colour_text.last_approved_text: The jagged edge of the biting blade ensures that even the strongest armour struggles to repel this weapon.

ancillaries.colour_text: The jagged edge of the biting blade ensures that even the strongest armour struggles to repel this weapon.

colour_text.last_approved_text: An enchanted duo of blades - one long and one short - give the wielder a dazzling array of skilful moves, to parry and deceive an opponent.

ancillaries.colour_text: An enchanted duo of blades - one long and one short - give the wielder a dazzling array of skilful moves, to parry and deceive an opponent.

colour_text.last_approved_text: A massive sword that is still surprisingly versatile to use in combat. Nevertheless, when it strikes it can cleave a foe in twain.

ancillaries.colour_text: A massive sword that is still surprisingly versatile to use in combat. Nevertheless, when it strikes it can cleave a foe in twain.

colour_text.last_approved_text: This golden sword gifts its user with a foresight and speed in combat that no mortal should ever have.

ancillaries.colour_text: This golden sword gifts its user with a foresight and speed in combat that no mortal should ever have.

colour_text.last_approved_text: A blade made of darkest obsidian with an edge that is said to not exist in this mortal plane - no armour can stand against it.

ancillaries.colour_text: A blade made of darkest obsidian with an edge that is said to not exist in this mortal plane - no armour can stand against it.

colour_text.last_approved_text: The Ogre Blade was used by Chaos Dwarfs to tame the kingdoms amongst the Mountains of Mourn. How it came to the Old World is a mystery.

ancillaries.colour_text: The Ogre Blade was used by Chaos Dwarfs to tame the kingdoms amongst the Mountains of Mourn. How it came to the Old World is a mystery.

colour_text.last_approved_text: The Red Axe was forged in Karak Eight Peaks, its vengeful runes made to destroy all Greenskins and vermin.

ancillaries.colour_text: The Red Axe was forged in Karak Eight Peaks, its vengeful runes made to destroy all Greenskins and vermin.

onscreen_name.last_approved_text: Red Axe of Karak Eight Peaks

ancillaries.onscreen_name: Red Axe of Karak Eight Peaks

colour_text.last_approved_text: The Relic Sword was discovered in an ancient barrow close to the swamps of Mourkain. There are not many beings that can shrug off a wound from this blade.

ancillaries.colour_text: The Relic Sword was discovered in an ancient barrow close to the swamps of Mourkain. There are not many beings that can shrug off a wound from this blade.

colour_text.last_approved_text: This blade was stolen from a Tomb Banshee while she sang a haunting nursery tale to a forgotten child. Now the blade sings too, and shrieks when it strikes a foe.

ancillaries.colour_text: This blade was stolen from a Tomb Banshee while she sang a haunting nursery tale to a forgotten child. Now the blade sings too, and shrieks when it strikes a foe.

colour_text.last_approved_text: The crude twin blades wielded by Azhag the Slaughterer are known as Slagga’s Slashas, but just who is Slagga?

ancillaries.colour_text: The crude twin blades wielded by Azhag the Slaughterer are known as Slagga’s Slashas, but just who is Slagga?

colour_text.last_approved_text: It is said Prince Sigvald’s ornate sword is forged from a sliver of Slaanesh’s own blade.

ancillaries.colour_text: It is said Prince Sigvald’s ornate sword is forged from a sliver of Slaanesh’s own blade.

colour_text.last_approved_text: Imbued with the quiddity of Ruin, Morghur's gnarled staff summons deadly Chaos Spawn to do his bidding on the battlefield.

ancillaries.colour_text: Imbued with the quiddity of Ruin, Morghur's gnarled staff summons deadly Chaos Spawn to do his bidding on the battlefield.

colour_text.last_approved_text: The Sword of Battle is a battered weapon, yet its many owners always remark upon how easy it is to wield in a fight.

ancillaries.colour_text: The Sword of Battle is a battered weapon, yet its many owners always remark upon how easy it is to wield in a fight.

colour_text.last_approved_text: A sword tinged red, for wherever it is swung bloodshed is guaranteed, with multiple foes falling in a single deadly arc.

ancillaries.colour_text: A sword tinged red, for wherever it is swung bloodshed is guaranteed, with multiple foes falling in a single deadly arc.

colour_text.last_approved_text: The Sword of Might is a grand blade in a rich pommel that imbues its owners with a boon of strength in the heat of battle.

ancillaries.colour_text: The Sword of Might is a grand blade in a rich pommel that imbues its owners with a boon of strength in the heat of battle.

colour_text.last_approved_text: The Sword of Strife never has an owner for long, for those who wield it will always find it in their hand when their temper rises.

ancillaries.colour_text: The Sword of Strife never has an owner for long, for those who wield it will always find it in their hand when their temper rises.

colour_text.last_approved_text: Found in the hands of a long-dead guardian, this sword guides its user, making them a much better fighter.

ancillaries.colour_text: Found in the hands of a long-dead guardian, this sword guides its user, making them a much better fighter.

colour_text.last_approved_text: A sword of silver that never dims. When used in anger, the sword arm of its owner darts forth before an opponent can even raise their guard.

ancillaries.colour_text: A sword of silver that never dims. When used in anger, the sword arm of its owner darts forth before an opponent can even raise their guard.

colour_text.last_approved_text: Before Grimnir disappeared into the north, he gifted his son Morgrim one of his legendary axes. It has been passed down to each High King ever since.

ancillaries.colour_text: Before Grimnir disappeared into the north, he gifted his son Morgrim one of his legendary axes. It has been passed down to each High King ever since.

colour_text.last_approved_text: Replicated by Runesmiths from a single scale wedged between the teeth of a slain Chaos Lord at the pivotal Battle of Thraag, the White Dwarf's armour is able to deflect even the hardest blows.

ancillaries.colour_text: Replicated by Runesmiths from a single scale wedged between the teeth of a slain Chaos Lord at the pivotal Battle of Thraag, the White Dwarf's armour is able to deflect even the hardest blows.

colour_text.last_approved_text: Long thought lost to time and conflict, Grombrindal's awesome helm inspires already-courageous Dwarfen hearts to even greater acts of bravery.

ancillaries.colour_text: Long thought lost to time and conflict, Grombrindal's awesome helm inspires already-courageous Dwarfen hearts to even greater acts of bravery.

colour_text.last_approved_text: Grombrindal's cloak was woven by Valaya herself as a token of the love she felt for the White Dwarf, as proven by the skill in needlework displayed.

ancillaries.colour_text: Grombrindal's cloak was woven by Valaya herself as a token of the love she felt for the White Dwarf, as proven by the skill in needlework displayed.

colour_text.last_approved_text: Mentioned in several sagas and legends, could the White Dwarf's mighty weapon be the fabled rune axe wielded by Grimnir at the dawn of history?

ancillaries.colour_text: Mentioned in several sagas and legends, could the White Dwarf's mighty weapon be the fabled rune axe wielded by Grimnir at the dawn of history?

colour_text.last_approved_text: The life essence of many wretched, innocent smallfolk ensures that those who drink from this cursed cup thrive with newfound power.

ancillaries.colour_text: The life essence of many wretched, innocent smallfolk ensures that those who drink from this cursed cup thrive with newfound power.
